tag_list: web, development, nigeria, social, media, internet, business, mobile, technology
overview:
Adesoji Adegbulu is a consultant cum entrepreneur whose interest is in Web Development, Social Media, Internet Business and Mobile Technology. It is this interest and a willingness to provide a good service that led him to start 9jacorp.com, makemoneyonlineng.com and many to come

He is a Nigerian and has Africa at heart. His project called 9jacorp is focused on first, Nigerian and second, Africa and then the rest of the world. The aim of his project is to build African Internet Entrepreneurs that will be a major player in the future of the web.

His aim is to make others succed by giving the right values and excellent information/development services built on Web 2.0 and the future of web.

His quote for this is;

“Extraordinary people knows that their success lies in helping others succeed. That is the value they give always. ” - Adesoji Adegbulu

degrees.subject: Science, Technology, Engineering
degrees.institution: Federal University of Technology, Akure, Ondo State, Nigeria
